## Generative Art: Part 1

```{r}

library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
view(msleep)
```

```{r}
msleep %>% 
  ggplot(aes(sleep_total, awake, color=vore, size=sleep_cycle)) + 
  geom_point(show.legend = FALSE, size = 25) + 
  coord_polar() + 
  theme_void() + 
  scale_color_brewer()
```
